DOC.brief_summary: Emerging research suggest fiber , particularly digestion-resistant maltodextrins Fibersol-2 , may impact satiety , decrease hunger , prolong satiation , and/or increase satiety signal gut . This research aim determine whether Fibersol-2 may impact satiety , decrease hunger , prolong satiation , and/or increase satiety signal gut .
DOC.criteria: . No know food allergy ii . Normal healthy individual iii . No food intake abnormality abnormal feed behavior iv . Average American BMI ( 2128 )
